content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"   xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"   xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"   xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" >  <channel rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=ELSIN&v=1.0">  <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=ELSIN&v=1.0</dc:identifier>  <title>ELSIN List</title>  <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ELSIN</link>  <description>ELSIN List Archives</description>  <dc:date>2015-02-10T08:41:39Z</dc:date>  <image rdf:resource="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif"/>    <items>   <rdf:Seq>     <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;76a30c28.1502"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;37a4ae39.1501"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;46f6160d.1501"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;1f2510bd.1411"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;cbfeff32.1410"/>     </rdf:Seq>  </items>   </channel>  <image rdf:about="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif">     <title>Powered by L-Soft's LISTSERV mailing list manager</title>     <link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;76a30c28.1502">   <title>ELSIN XX International Conference - Final Call for submissions </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;76a30c28.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Please consider this final call for submissions.<br><br>ELSIN would like to invite you to submit abstract for the 20th Annual International Conference of the Education, Learning, Styles &amp; Individual differences Network on 1st to 3rd July, 2015 at the University of Exeter.<br><br>This conference is for anyone interested in enhancing learning and teaching in education and/or workplace contexts and will feature research and practice-based work. If you are involved in developing learning and teaching we would like to hear from you. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-10T08:41:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Prof. Carol Evans for ELSIN</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;76a30c28.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;37a4ae39.1501">   <title>The Co-Creation Paradigm </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;37a4ae39.1501</link>   <description> Dear ELSIN subscribers,<br><br>We hope this title is of interest.<br><br>[The Co-Creation Paradigm]&lt;http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/the-co-creation-paradigm&gt;The Co-Creation Paradigm&lt;http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/the-co-creation-paradigm&gt;<br>Venkat Ramaswamy &amp; Kerimcan Ozcan<br>&quot;Creating and maintaining a competitive advantage is a race towards an ever moving target. Co-creation is the latest lever to get ahead by involving business partners, directly drawing upon their skills and efforts. Doing this requires a new business paradigm, which is well captured in Ramaswamy and Ozcan's practical and inspiring book.&quot;-Hans L\ufffd\ufffdss\ufffd\ufffde, Senior Director, Strategic Risk Management, The LEGO Group<br>"As a sequel to The Future of Competition and The Power of Co-Creation, Venkat Ramaswamy and co-author Kerimcan Ozcan [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-26T13:18:05+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Rachel Shand</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;37a4ae39.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;46f6160d.1501">   <title>ELSIN XX International Conference - Extended Submission Deadline </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;46f6160d.1501</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Submission extended deadline.<br><br>ELSIN would like to invite you to submit abstract for the 20th Annual International Conference of the Education, Learning, Styles &amp; Individual differences Network on 1st to 3rd July, 2015 at the University of Exeter.<br><br>This conference is for anyone interested in enhancing learning and teaching in education and/or workplace contexts and will feature research and practice-based work. If you are involved in developing learning and teaching we would like to hear from you. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-09T08:08:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Prof. Carol Evans for ELSIN</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;46f6160d.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;1f2510bd.1411">   <title>Education, Learning, Styles and Individual difference network - XX International Conference 4th Call </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;1f2510bd.1411</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>ELSIN would like to invite you to attend the 20th Annual International Conference of the Education, Learning, Styles &amp; Individual differences Network on 1st to 3rd July, 2015 at the University of Exeter.<br><br>This conference is for anyone interested in enhancing learning and teaching in education and/or workplace contexts and will feature research and practice-based work. If you are involved in developing learning and teaching we would like to hear from you. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-12T13:53:36+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Prof. Carol Evans for ELSIN</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;1f2510bd.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;cbfeff32.1410">   <title>Education, Learning, Styles and Individual difference network - XX International Conference Third Call </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;cbfeff32.1410</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>ELSIN would like to invite you to attend the 20th Annual International Conference of the Education, Learning, Styles &amp; Individual differences Network on 1st to 3rd July, 2015 at the University of Exeter.<br><br>This conference is for anyone interested in enhancing learning and teaching in education and/or workplace contexts and will feature research and practice-based work. If you are involved in developing learning and teaching we would like to hear from you. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-14T11:43:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Prof. Carol Evans for ELSIN</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELSIN;cbfeff32.1410</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
